descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a user from the current organization

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve many users in the current organization

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a user in the current organization

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

title.name: title
title.description: Title of the dashboard to create
title.ai_hint: Title of the dashboard to create

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: email
options.description: Email of the team to create

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

dashboardUidOrUrl.name: dashboardUidOrUrl
dashboardUidOrUrl.description: Unique alphabetic identifier or URL of the dashboard to update
dashboardUidOrUrl.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: name
options.description: Name of the team to filter by

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the team to create
name.ai_hint: Name of the team to create

teamId.name: teamId
teamId.description: Team to retrieve all members from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
teamId.ai_hint: Team to retrieve all members from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

userId.name: userId
userId.description: ID of the user to delete
userId.ai_hint: ID of the user to delete

memberId.name: memberId
memberId.description: User to remove from the team. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
memberId.ai_hint: User to remove from the team. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'dashboard' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'dashboard' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'dashboard' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'dashboard' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'dashboardUidOrUrl'
IF resource == 'dashboard' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'dashboardUidOrUrl'
IF resource == 'dashboard' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'dashboard' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'dashboard' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'dashboard' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'dashboardUidOrUrl'
IF resource == 'dashboard' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'team' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamId'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamId'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamId'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'teamMember' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'teamMember' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'teamMember' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamId'
IF resource == 'teamMember' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'memberId'
IF resource == 'teamMember' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamId'
IF resource == 'teamMember' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamId'
IF resource == 'teamMember' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'teamMember' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
